page.title: 17MOUNTSORREL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I have a family of four: my Mum,Dad, my brother and myself.We get up and have breakfast all together.We eat toast,some times Kelloggs Corn Flakes and have a cup of tea.I go and clean my teeth, wash and get dressed.I brush my hair and turn the radio on to Radio Leicester.I walk to school stopping to collect Emily and feed a goat!Then I go to the Hall,sing and pray. Then we do English,Maths, Topic ,cooking ,clay,swimming and needlework.I have a form teacher but we move round to different teachers. When I get home I change into a skirt,blouse,dress or tracksuit.Some nights I go dancing,on others I go cross-country running with my teacher.On Thursday I listen to Pop Music and my best Pop group is Wham! Then I read comics and books.I also watch TV - I like Eastenders.
